file_insights.purpose: Implement optimized EMA fusion kernel for computing multiple indicators in a single pass
Likely added module import for ema_fusion

patterns_discovered: Fused computation of multiple EMA-family indicators
Single-pass data processing for performance optimization
Generic implementation using num_traits for type flexibility
Detailed error handling for input validation
gotchas_discovered: Careful handling of NaN values during initialization
Complex index management for different indicator validities
Need to validate input data length against computational requirements
Managing memory efficiency while computing multiple indicators simultaneously

key_achievements: Created a highly performant EMA fusion kernel
Implemented multiple EMA-derived indicators (EMA, DEMA, TEMA)
Provided detailed documentation and usage examples

recommendations: Add comprehensive benchmarks to validate performance claims
Consider creating more fusion kernels for other indicator families
Explore potential SIMD optimizations for further performance improvements
Write extensive property-based tests to ensure computational accuracy
Create more complex usage examples demonstrating real-world scenarios
